title: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
tags: curriculum of strategy artistry of war
content:
Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War can only be learned from the scroll in Sorcerous Vault. Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation School. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War Information

Description: Summon the apparitions of 6 master strategists. E
